WorkItem.Description: Taldron's Long Neglected Boots do not properly indicate their +6 Agility Socket bonus when a Bold Cardinal Ruby and Inscribed Ametrine gems are installed in the item. Rawr currently shows "No Socket Bonus" despite the correct gem colors being used. This means the DPS values calculated via Rawr are lower than actual for this gem combination.
WorkItem.Summary: Taldron's Long Neglected Boots-Socket Bonus Incorrect

Comments.Message: Please search for existing issues before posting. The Armory does not provide socket bonuses.
